job.title: Campaign Manager
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtoverviewltstronggtltpgtltpgtpicnichealth is all about making medical records easy to access and using data to power the next frontier of medical research we work directly with patients to give them the only tool anywhere that truly provides all of their medical records from any doctor or healthcare system in the usin an easytouse secure online dashboard patients can then choose to contribute their unique data to scientific research which helps researchers accelerate breakthroughs in care for the diseases they care about to date weve helped tens of thousands of patients partnered with some of the worlds largest biopharma companies and raised more than m including from felicis ventures amplify partners and y combinator post series b were growing quickly in revenue partnerships and people its an exciting time to join the picnichealth teamampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtthe opportunityltstronggtltpgtltpgtpicnichealth is seeking a campaign manager as we build out our direct to patient marketing teamampnbspltpgtltpgtas a campaign manager youll be joining our small but growing marketing team with the huge opportunity to work on endtoend patient recruitment campaigns to bring more patients to the picnichealth platform youll understand our target patient population and then create a plan for how to recruit them to join the platform youre excited to be creative and actively experiment with new and different ways of recruiting patients to see what sticks for each group you love the nuts and bolts of marketing from analyzing channel performance to creating projections that can be used for future programs you have a great eye for detail and are an eager project manager capable of juggling the many requirements of a partner to get a new campaign up and running you will collaborate closely with teams throughout the company and report directly to the head of growth and recruitment with the opportunity to build your skillset and expand your impact over timeampnbspltpgtltpgtwe are looking for an exceptional project and stakeholder manager who is ambitious adaptable and eager to learn with a track record of taking initiative and thriving in a resultsoriented fastpaced environment while we are looking for someone with empathy for our users primarily patients with chronic illnesses experience in healthcare is not required or even necessarily preferred our users are first and foremost people who want useful compelling product experiences just like any consumerampnbspthats what we give themampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat youll do at picnichealthampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltstronggtdrive executionltstronggtampnbspdevelop execute and manage plans for achieving our patient recruitment goalsltligtltligtltstronggtown resultsltstronggtampnbspevaluate efficacy of tactics and develop standard reporting that can be shared throughout the organization optimize through rigorous testingltligtltligtltstronggtsupport our recruitment channelsltstronggtltligtltligtltstronggtcome up with creative ways of identifying where our target audience is and how to reach them using various platform tools and data sourcesltstronggtltligtltligtcreate strong relationships with recruitment partnersltligtltligtmanaging multiple partner interactions and deadlines simultaneously with high qualityltligtltligtbuild structured execution plans from highlevel objectivesampnbspltligtltligtcollaborate with our clinical data experts to guide partners to get the most value out of the picnic research data andltligtltligtmanage collateral requirements creation and delivery to partnersltligtltligtltstronggtproject and analyze performanceltstronggtltligtltligtltstronggttrack performance of channels and identify areas for improvementltstronggtltligtltligtcreate projections for new campaignsltligtltligtdevelop frameworks for projecting future performance and feasibility based on past performance of related campaignsampnbspltligtltligtltstronggtrepresent and champion picnichealthltstronggtampnbspin daytoday partnership management and program managementltligtltligtltstronggtboost the teamltstronggt collaborate effectively with teammates in marketing sales creative operations engineering and partnerships to raise the bar in executing all of our campaignsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtyou are a strong candidate ifampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtyou have years of experience in business strategy marketing andor partnerships at leading saas software company or strategy consulting firm and a bachelors degree in businessrelated field of studyltligtltligtyoure an exceptional project manager researching structuring and managing project plans and communication with internal and external stakeholdersltligtltligtyoure comfortable in a fastpaced startup environment and excited to flex into new areas of marketing and partnerships as the work evolvesampnbspltligtltligtyoure detailoriented and highly organized while flawlessly managing multiple projects simultaneouslyltligtltligtyoure able to understand and analyze data with a high degree of comfortampnbspltligtltligtyou have strong interpersonal skills for patient success and engagementampnbspampnbspltligtltligtyoure motivated to be amazing in your role and ultimately improve the lives of patientsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhy join picnichealthltstronggtltpgtltpgtat picnichealth you get to solve real problems with real solutions great tech and great peopleampnbspltpgtltpgtyou also getltpgtltulgtltligtcompetitive salaryampnbspltligtltligtcomprehensive benefits including above market health dental visionltligtltligtfamily friendlyampnbspltligtltligtflexible time offltligtltligtk planltligtltligtfree picnichealth accountltligtltligtequipment and internet funds for home office set upampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtfor this role picnichealth is open to full time or contractltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtdue to covid currently all roles are remote as of october we will offer a hybrid set up team members in the bay area will be able to work from the sf office on a flexible schedule remote team members will be expected to travel to inperson meetings times a yearltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtequal opportunity statementltstronggtltpgtltpgtpicnichealth is committed to promoting an inclusive work environment free of discrimination and harassment we value a diverse and balanced team where everyone can belongltpgt
